text: Sliver: Music from the Motion Picture is a soundtrack album for the 1993 film Sliver. It peaked at number 23 on the Billboard 200 charthttp://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/1993-06-26 and was certified gold by the RIAA on December 17, 1993. (search term: Sliver) ==Track listing== #"Can't Help Falling in Love" #* Performed by UB40 #* Written by George David Weiss, Hugo Peretti, Luigi Creatore #* Produced by UB40 #"Carly's Song" #* Performed by Enigma #* Written by Michael Cretu #* Produced by Michael Cretu #"Slid" #* Performed by Fluke #* Written by Michael Bryant, Michael Tournier, Jonathan Fugler #* Produced by Fluke #"Unfinished Sympathy" #* Performed by Massive Attack #* Written by Grantley Marshall, Robert Del Naja, Andrew Vowles, J. Sharp, Shara Nelson #* Produced by Massive Attack with Jonny Dollar # "The Most Wonderful Girl" #* Performed by Lords of Acid #* Written by Oliver Adams, Nikki Van Lierop, Maurice Engelen #* Produced by Jade 4 U, Oliver Adams and Praga Khan # "Oh Carolina" #* Performed by Shaggy #* Written by John Folkes [not credited on album] #* Contains "Peter Gunn Theme" by Henry Mancini #* Produced by Sting International # "Move with Me" #* Performed by Neneh Cherry #* Written by Neneh Cherry, Cameron McVey #* Produced by Booga Bear/Jonny Dollar/Neneh Cherry # "Slave to the Vibe" #* Performed by Aftershock #* Written by V. Jeffrey Smith, Peter Lord, Guy Routte # "Penthouse and Pavement" #* Performed by Heaven 17 #* Written by Ian Craig Marsh, Martyn Ware, Glenn Gregory #* Produced by British Electric Foundation # "Skinflowers" #* Performed by The Young Gods #* Music by The Young Gods, Roli Mosimann #* Lyrics by Franz #* Produced by Roli Mosimann # "Star Sail" #* Performed by Verve #* Written by Simon Jones, Peter Salisbury, Nick McCabe, Richard Ashcroft #* Produced by John Leckie # "Wild at Heart" #* Performed by BIGOD 20 #* Written by Marcus Nikolai, Zip Campisi #* Produced by BIGOD 20 and Nino Tielmann # "Carly's Loneliness" #* Performed by Enigma #* Written by Michael Cretu #* Produced by Michael Cretu == Chart history == {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1993) !align="left"|Peak position |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard 200 |align="center"|23 |- |} ==References== Category:1993 soundtrack albums Category:Virgin Records soundtracks Category:1993 compilation albums Category:Thriller film soundtracks
title: Sliver (soundtrack)
